thumb.title: Run for You

Jump into the crowed of emotionless people. Runnin through the burning city. Run, run, run for you. Run, run, all for you. Run, run, run for you. Run, run, all for you. Beat the crock,tasks in line on my way. No giving up,this heart's on fire. The sudden call, bring back your eyes ablaze with emotion. No road too long whatever it takes. Run, run, run for you. Run, run, all for you. Run, run, run for you. Run, run, all for you.
